description: Retrieves information about a group (batch) of policies.

parameters.name: requests
parameters.description: An array of up to 100 policies you want information about. (dict) --- Information about a policy that you include in a BatchGetPolicy API request. policyStoreId (string) --- The identifier of the policy store where the policy you want information about is stored. policyId (string) --- The identifier of the policy you want information about.

nested_items.name: results
nested_items.description: Information about the policies listed in the request that were successfully returned. These results are returned in the order they were requested.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy store where the policy you want information about is stored.

nested_items.name: policyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy you want information about.

nested_items.name: policyType
nested_items.description: The type of the policy. This is one of the following values:
STATIC.
TEMPLATE_LINKED.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The policy definition of an item in the list of policies returned.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the static policy.

nested_items.name: statement
nested_items.description: The content of the static policy written in the Cedar policy language.

nested_items.name: templateLinked
nested_items.description: Information about a template-linked policy that was created by instantiating a policy template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the policy template used to create this policy.

nested_items.name: principal
nested_items.description: The principal associated with this template-linked policy. Verified Permissions substitutes this principal for the ?principal placeholder in the policy template when it evaluates an authorization request.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityType
nested_items.description: The type of an entity.

nested_items.name: entityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of an entity.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the policy was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Information about the policies from the request that resulted in an error. These results are returned in the order they were requested.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code that was returned.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy store associated with the failed request.

nested_items.name: policyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the policy associated with the failed request.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A detailed error message.
